sourceCode: const int A=$0$;precision mediump float;varying vec2 vCoord;uniform sampler2D B;uniform vec2 C;uniform float D[A];uniform int E;uniform int F;void main(){vec2 G=vec2(1.,1.)/C;const int H=A/2;vec4 I=vec4(0.);for(int J=0;J<A;J++){int K=J-H;I+=texture2D(B,vCoord+G*vec2(K*E,K*F))*D[J];}gl_FragColor=vec4(I.rgb,1.);}
